mapper.select: select _approver.acId,_approver.approverId,_approver.approval_type as approvalType from flow_template_approver _approver where _approver.flow_template_id = #{flowTemplateId} and _approver.flow_ac_id = #{acId}

SELECT a.id, a.flow_template_id AS flowTemplateId, a.flow_ac_id AS flowAcId, a.approverId AS approverId, a.approval_type AS approvalType, a.approval_type_name AS approvalTypeName, a.im_user_id AS imUserId, a.user_type AS userType, a.delflag FROM flow_template_approver a LEFT JOIN flow_template t ON t.`code` = #{code} AND t.delflag = 0 WHERE a.flow_template_id = t.id
